scripts.tenant-registration:create: claudia create  --config tenant-registration.claudia.json --name lmx-tenant-registration  --handler lambda/tenant-registration.handler --set-env NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./lib/config-helper/config/  --deploy-proxy-api --region us-west-2
scripts.tenant-manager:create: claudia create  --config tenant-manager.claudia.json --name lmx-tenant-manager  --handler lambda/tenant-manager.handler --set-env NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./lib/config-helper/config/  --deploy-proxy-api --region us-west-2
scripts.XXXdeploy:create: claudia create --config tenant-manager2.claudia.json --name lmx-tenant-manager2  --handler lambda/tenant-manager.handler --set-env NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./lib/config-helper/config/  --deploy-proxy-api --region us-west-2
